DOC.brief_summary: Aim study evaluate clinical efficacy placental membrane coronally advance flap cover single multiple Miller 's class I II gingival recession defect .
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY DESIGN A total number 60 teeth 15 subject select . Patients bilateral Miller 's class I II gingival recession defect maxillary mandibular anterior premolar region select divide two group use split mouth design . GroupI ( Control ) -30 recession defect treat coronally advanced flap alone , use Zucchelli 's technique . Group II ( Test ) - 30 recession defect treat coronally advanced flap , use Zucchelli 's technique along placental membrane . CLINICAL PARAMETERS : 1 . Probing Pocket Depth ( PPD ) 2 . Clinical Attachment Level ( CAL ) 3 . Height Gingival Recession ( HGR ) 4 . Width Gingival Recession ( WGR ) 5 . Width Keratinized Gingiva ( WKG ) The clinical parameter assess & record 0 day , 90th day 180th day
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients within age group 23 55 year 2 . Bilateral , upper low , Miller 's class I Class II gingival recession defect confine anterior premolar region . 3 . Presence identifiable cementoenamel junction 4 . Presence keratinize tissue apical expose root 1 . Systemic complication 2 . Occlusal interferences 3 . Any contraindication periodontal surgery take medication know interfere periodontal tissue health heal 4 . Previous periodontal surgery involve site 5 . Smokers 6 . Pregnant lactating mother
